title: ICT Competency Development Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and foundational knowledge in educational theory
context.additional_context: Graduate education environment enabling collaborative learning through online platforms in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting

learning_goals: Learners can design methods to integrate three or more ICT tools into educational settings through inquiry-based learning.
Learners can share ICT-based teaching cases with peer pre-service teachers and exchange feedback using online platforms.
Learners can complete an ICT-integrated instructional design document applicable to real classroom scenarios through project-based assessment.

resources: Access Rights to Digital Educational Content Library

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
